</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Deferred financing costs are net of accumulated amortization of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$482
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$191
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	at April 30, 2016 and 2015, respectively.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Amortization of deferred financing costs for the year ended April 30, 2016 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$291
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Amortization of deferred financing costs will be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$466
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the year ending April 30, 2017 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$90
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for each of the four years ending April 30, 2018,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2019
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2020
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2021
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Line of Credit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The remaining
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$15.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million of the Hunter Mountain acquisition price was financed with funds drawn on the Company&#x2019;s line of credit with Royal Banks of Missouri pursuant to the Credit Facility, Loan and Security Agreement (the &#x201C;Line of Credit Agreement&#x201D;) between the Company and Royal Banks of Missouri, effective as of December 22, 2015. The Company drew an additional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$0.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million to pay closing costs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Line of Credit Agreement provides for a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	-month line of credit for up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$20.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million to be used for acquisition purposes and working capital of up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of the acquisition purchase price, subject to the Company&#x2019;s ability to extend the line of credit for up to an additional 12-month period upon the satisfaction of certain conditions. In connection with entry into the Line of Credit Agreement, the Company executed a promissory note (the &#x201C;Line of Credit Note&#x201D;) in favor of Royal Banks of Missouri, maturing on December 22, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;The line of credit debt is included as a current liability given the initial 12-month term.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	F -
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage64"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Interest on the amounts borrowed are charged at the prime rate plus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, provided that past due amounts shall be subject to higher interest rates and late charges.&nbsp;&nbsp;The effective rate at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	April 30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 2016 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	on the line of credit borrowings. Amounts outstanding under the Line of Credit Agreement are secured by the assets of each of the subsidiary borrowers under the Line of Credit Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Line of Credit Agreement includes restrictions or limitations on certain transactions, including mergers, acquisitions, leases, asset sales, loans to third parties, and the incurrence of certain additional debt and liens. Financial covenants set forth in the Line of Credit Agreement consist of a maximum leverage ratio (as defined in the Line of Credit Agreement) of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	65%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, above which the Company is prohibited from incurring additional indebtedness, and a debt service coverage ratio (as defined in the Line of Credit Agreement) of 1:25 to 1 on a fiscal year basis. The Company must also maintain a consolidated fixed charge coverage ratio (as defined in the Master Credit Agreement) which (i) requires the Company to increase the balance of its debt service reserve account if the Company&#x2019;s consolidated fixed charge coverage ratio falls below
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1.50
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	:1.00 and (ii) prohibits the Company from paying dividends if the ratio is below
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1.25
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	:1.00. The payment of dividends is also prohibited during potential default or default situations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	If the outstanding line of credit debt is not paid in full by the maturity date, and the Company is otherwise is full compliance with the terms and conditions of the Line of Credit Agreement and Line of Credit Note, the Company may elect to convert the outstanding line of credit debt to a three-year term loan, subject to an additional extension, with principal payments amortized over a 20-year period bearing interest at the prime rate plus 1.0% per annum.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Except in the case of a default, the Company may prepay all or any portion of the outstanding line of credit debt and all accrued and unpaid interest due prior to the maturity date without prepayment penalty.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In the case of a default, the outstanding Line of Credit Debt shall, at the lender&#x2019;s option, bear interest at the rate of 5.0% percent per annum in excess of the interest rate otherwise payable thereon, which interest shall be payable on demand.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Under the terms of the Line of Credit Agreement, the occurrence of a change of control is an event of default. A change of control will be deemed to occur if (i) for so long as the line of redit debt is outstanding and such individuals are employed by the Company, the Company&#x2019;s key shareholders (Messrs. Timothy Boyd, Stephen Mueller and Richard Deutsch) cease to beneficially own and control less than 50% of the amount of the Company&#x2019;s outstanding voting stock that they own as of the effective date of the Line of Credit Agreement, or (ii) the Company ceases to beneficially own and control less than all of the outstanding shares of voting stock of the subsidiary borrowers.&nbsp;&nbsp;Other events of default include, but are not limited to, a default on other indebtedness of the Company or its subsidiaries.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Additional Interest Reserve
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	he Master Credit Agreement includes financial covenants consisting of a maximum Leverage Ratio (as defined in the Master Credit Agreement) of 65%, above which the Company and certain of its subsidiaries are prohibited from incurring additional indebtedness, and a Consolidated Fixed Charge Coverage Ratio (as defined in the Master Credit Agreement) covenant, which (a)&nbsp;requires the Company to increase the balance of its debt service reserve account if the Company's Consolidated Fixed Charge Coverage Ratio falls below 1.50:1.00, and (b)&nbsp;prohibits the Company from paying dividends if the ratio is below 1.25:1.00. The payment of dividends is also prohibited during default situations under the terms of the Master Credit Agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Company&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	most recent fiscal year end,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Company&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	fixed charge ratio fell below the 1:50:1:00 coverage ratio
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, but was above the 1.25:1.00 ratio.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As a result,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	increase the balance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Company&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	debt service reserve account by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$3.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million.&nbsp;&nbsp;EPR has agreed to delay the additional interest reserve payment until the end of the 2016/2017 ski season.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.40%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:13.04%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Realization of deferred tax assets is dependent upon sufficient future
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	taxable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	income during the period that the deductible temporary differences and carryforwards are expected to be available to reduce taxable income. Based on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the reversal patterns of existing taxable temporary differences
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the net deferred tax assets will be recovered. There was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	valuation allowance deemed necessary.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage66"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company accounts for income taxes in accordance with ASC 740,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Income Taxes.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Deferred tax assets and liabilities are recognized for the future tax consequences attributable to differences between the financial statement carrying amounts of existing assets and liabilities and their respective tax bases and operating loss and tax credit carryforwards. Deferred tax assets and liabilities are measured using enacted tax rates expected to apply to taxable income in the years in which those temporary differences are expected to be recovered or settled. The effect on deferred tax assets and liabilities of a change in tax rates is recognized in income in the period that includes the enactment date. A valuation allowance is provided for the amount of deferred tax assets that, based on available evidence, are not expected to be realized.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	For fiscal years 2016, 2015, and 2014, the expected income tax rate differs from the statutory rate as follows (in thousands):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In connection with the Company&#x2019;s initial public offering in November 2014, a change of ownership in the Company occurred pursuant to the provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986. As a result, the Company&#x2019;s usage of its net operating loss carryforwards will be limited each year; however, management believes the full benefit of those carryforwards will be realized prior to their respective expiration dates.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company accounts for unrecognized tax benefits also in accordance with ASC 740, Income Taxes, which prescribes a minimum probability threshold that a tax position must meet before a financial statement benefit is recognized. The minimum threshold is defined as a tax position that is more likely than not to be sustained upon examination by the applicable taxing authority, including resolution to any related appeals or litigation, based solely on the technical merits of the position. The Company has no accrual for interest or penalties related to uncertain tax positions at April 30, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, and did not recognize interest or penalties in the Statements of Operations during the years ended April 30,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2016,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The major jurisdictions in which the Company files income tax returns include the federal and state jurisdictions within the United States. The tax years after 2009 remain open to examination by federal and state taxing jurisdictions. However, the Company has NOLs beginning in 2001 which would cause the statute of limitations to remain open for the year in which the NOL was incurred.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Management regularly assesses the likelihood that its net deferred tax assets will be recovered from future taxable income. To the extent management believes that it is more likely than not that a net deferred tax asset will not be realized, a valuation allowance is established. When a valuation allowance is established or increased, an income tax charge is included in the consolidated financial statements and net deferred tax assets are adjusted accordingly. Changes in tax law, statutory tax rates, and estimates of the Company&#x2019;s future taxable income levels could result in actual realization of the net deferred tax assets being materially different from the amounts provided for in the consolidated financial statements. If the actual recovery amount of the deferred tax asset is less than anticipated, the Company would be required to write off the remaining deferred tax asset and increase the tax provision, resulting in a reduction of net income and stockholders&#x2019; equity.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company does
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	t have any unrecognized tax benefits and has
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	t incurred any interest and penalties for fiscal years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2016,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note 6.&nbsp;&nbsp;Acquisition
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Hunter Mountain
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	F -
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	19
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage67"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Effective January 6, 2016, the Company acquired all of the outstanding common stock of Hunter Mountain in Hunter, New York, for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$35.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million paid to the sellers in cash and the Company&#x2019;s assumption of $1.7 million in capitalized lease obligations. The Company incurred approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$0.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million in transaction costs recorded within general and administrative expenses on the income statement.&nbsp;&nbsp;The company also incurred
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$1.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million of financing costs which were capitalized as deferred financing costs associated with the debt obligations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company financed $20.0 million, of the acquisition price pursuant to the terms of the Hunter Mountain Credit Agreement and Hunter Mountain Note with EPR, which bears interest at a rate of 8.0%, subject to annual increases as discussed in Note 4, &#x201C;Long-term Debt.&#x201D;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company borrowed an additional $1.0 million under the Hunter Mountain Credit Agreement to fund closing and other costs. Debt under the Hunter Mountain Note requires monthly interest payments until its maturity on January 5, 2036. An additional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$15.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million of the Hunter Mountain acquisition price was financed through a draw on the Company&#x2019;s line of credit with Royal Banks of Missouri, which bears interest at the prime rate plus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1.0%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and matures on December 22, 2016, as discussed in Note 4 above under the title &#x201C;Line of Credit&#x201D;.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Hunter Mountain&#x2019;s results of operations are included in the accompanying consolidated financial statements for the year ended April 30, 2016 from the date of acquisition. The preliminary allocation of the purchase price is as follows (in thousands):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.84%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:13.50PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:18.66%;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:2PT DOUBLE #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:13.50PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">
	35,000&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The purchase price allocation is preliminary, mainly due to continued review of the deferred tax liability and intangibles.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company adjusted the purchase price allocation in the fourth quarter as a result of obtaining more information regarding the values of certain assets and liabilities.&nbsp; The adjustments were primarily to increase (decrease) Buildings and Improvements, Equipment, Intangible Assets, Goodwill, and the Deferred Tax Liability by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$752
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$7,470
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$865
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$(6,280)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$3,085
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, respectively. The income statement effect related to these adjustments was not material.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Company paid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$35.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	million for the transaction and as part of the allocation received $1.6 million in cash, resulting in a net cash change of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$33.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	million in cash. As part of the transaction, the Company has recognized goodwill associated with the expected synergies of combining operations as well as the overall enterprise value of the resort.&nbsp;&nbsp;No goodwill will arise for income tax purposes and accordingly, none of the book goodwill will be deductible for tax purposes.&nbsp;&nbsp;Hunter Mountain will be considered its own reporting unit with respect to goodwill impairment, which will be completed at least annually.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The revenue and net loss included in the accompanying consolidated statements of net loss resulting from the Hunter Mountain acquisition since the Acquisition Date (January 6, 2016) were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$13,614
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$3,083
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The following presents the unaudited pro forma consolidated financial information as if the acquisition of Hunter Mountain was completed on May 1, 2014, the beginning of the Company's 2015 fiscal year. The following pro forma financial information includes adjustments for depreciation and interest paid pursuant to the Hunter Mountain Note and property and equipment recorded at the date of acquisition. This pro forma financial information is presented for informational purposes
</FONT>
</P>
<P>

</TD>

	(1,426)
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:45.20%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:25.50PT;PADDING:0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note 7. Sale/Leaseback
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In November 2005,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Company sold Mad River Mountain and simultaneously leased the property back for a period of 21 years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. The resultant gain was deferred and is being ratably recognized in income over the term of the lease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:1.2PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#808080;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:1.2PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#808080;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:1.2PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note 8.&nbsp;&nbsp;Employee Benefit Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company maintains a tax-deferred savings plan for all eligible employees. Employees become eligible to participate after attaining the age of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	21
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and completing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	year of service. Employee contributions to the plan are tax-deferred under Section 401(k) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended. Company matching contributions are made at the discretion of the board of directors.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	No
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	contributions were made in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2016,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On November 4, 2015, the Company&#x2019;s board of directors adopted the Peak Resorts, Inc. 2014 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#x201C;Incentive Plan&#x201D;), and on November 5, 2014, the Company&#x2019;s stockholders approved the Incentive Plan. The stockholders approved a maximum of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	559,296
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shares to be available for issuance under the Incentive Plan. The Incentive Plan authorizes the Company to grant stock options, stock appreciation rights, restricted stock, restricted stock units, stock bonuses, other stock based awards, cash awards, or any combination thereof, as defined in and allowed by the Incentive Plan.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	During fiscal 2016, the company issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	63,741
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	restricted stock units to independent directors, of which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5,334
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	were forfeited, resulting in a remaining balance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	500,889
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shares available for issuance.&nbsp;&nbsp;The company has recorded compensation expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$0.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million associated with these awards during fiscal 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note&nbsp;9. Financial Instruments and Concentrations of Credit Risk
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The following methods and assumptions were used to estimate the fair value of each class of financial instruments to which the Company is a party:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Cash and cash equivalents, restricted cash:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;Due to the highly liquid nature of the Company&#x2019;s short
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#8209;term investments, the carrying values of cash and cash equivalents and restricted cash approximate their fair values.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Accounts receivable:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The carrying value of accounts receivable approximate their fair value because of their short
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#8209;term nature.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Accounts payable and accrued expenses:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The carrying value of accounts payable and accrued liabilities approximates fair value due to the short
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#8209; term maturities of these amounts.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Long
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#8209;term debt:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The fair value of the Company&#x2019;s long
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#8209;term debt is estimated based on the quoted market prices for the same or similar issues or on the current rates offered to the Company for debt of the same remaining maturities. The interest rates on the Company&#x2019;s long
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#8209;term debt instruments are consistent with those currently available to the Company for borrowings with similar maturities and terms and, accordingly, their fair values are consistent with their carrying values.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	F -
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	21
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage69"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Concentrations of credit risk:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s financial instruments that are exposed to concentrations of credit risk consist primarily of cash and cash equivalents and restricted cash. The Company&#x2019;s cash and cash equivalents and restricted cash are on deposit with financial institutions where such balances will, at times, be in excess of federally insured limits. Excess cash balances are collateralized by the backing of government securities. The Company has not experienced any loss as a result of those deposits.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:1.2PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:1.2PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note&nbsp;10. Commitments and Contingencies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Restricted cash:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The provisions of certain of the Company&#x2019;s debt instruments generally require that the Company make and maintain a deposit, to be held in escrow for the benefit of the lender, in an amount equal to the estimated minimum interest payment for the upcoming fiscal year.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, the Company has funds it is holding in escrow in connection with its efforts to raise funds under the EB-5 Program.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company intends to use the current and future funds for future development.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Loss contingencies:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The Company is periodically involved in various claims and legal proceedings, many of which occur in the normal course of business. Management routinely assesses the likelihood of adverse judgments or outcomes, including consideration of its insurable coverage and discloses or records estimated losses in accordance with ASC 450, &#x201C;Contingencies&#x201D;. After consultation with legal counsel, the Company does not anticipate that liabilities arising out of these claims would, if plaintiffs are successful, have a material adverse effect on its business, operating results or financial condition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Leases:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The Company leases certain land, land improvements, buildings and equipment under non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#8209;cancelable operating leases. Certain of the leases contain escalation provisions based generally on changes in the CPI with maximum annual percentage increases capped at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. Additionally, certain leases contain contingent rental provisions which are based on revenue. The amount of contingent rentals was insignificant in all periods presented. Total rent expense under such operating leases was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$1,732
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$1,756
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$2,075
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and&nbsp;&nbsp;for years ended April 30, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, respectively. The Company also leases certain equipment under capital leases.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Future minimum rentals under all non

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note 13.&nbsp;&nbsp;Related Party Transactions
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On October 30, 2007, the Company and certain of its subsidiaries entered into an Amended and Restated Credit and Security Agreement with EPT Ski Properties, Inc. pursuant to which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	EPT Ski Properties, Inc. provided the Company with a $31.0 million operating loan. This amount was later increased to $56.0 million upon the execution of the fifth amended and restated promissory note, dated July 13, 2012. Messrs. Boyd and Mueller and Richard Deutsch, the Company&#x2019;s Chief Executive Officer, Chief Financial Officer and Chief Development and Acquisitions Officer, respectively, executed a Consent and Agreement of Guarantors on October 30, 2007 pursuant to which they each personally guaranteed payment of the amount due by the Company under, and satisfaction of all other obligations pursuant to, the Amended and Restated Credit and Security Agreement. See Note 4 to the consolidated financial statements for terms of the agreements. On November 10, 2014, the Company entered into a Restructure Agreement. As a part of the Agreement, the guaranty by Messrs. Boyd, Mueller and Deutsch terminated, and in its place the Company and certain of its subsidiaries guaranteed all of the Company&#x2019;s obligations to EPR under the restructured loans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In January 2016, a director was added to the Company&#x2019;s board of directors.&nbsp;&nbsp;This director is a partner at a law firm utilized by the Company.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;In calendar year 2016, the company incurred expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$224
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	with the firm.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ITEM 9A.&nbsp;&nbsp;C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ontrols and Procedures
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Evaluation of Disclosure Controls and Procedures
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 10.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Company&#x2019;s management, with the participation of the Company&#x2019;s Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, evaluated the effectiveness of the Company&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures (as that term is defined in Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended the &#x201C;Exchange Act&#x201D;), as of the end of the period covered by this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	nnual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	eport on Form 10-K. Based on that evaluation, management, with the participation of the Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, concluded that the Company&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	nnual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	eport on Form 10-K, are functioning effectively to provide reasonable assurance that the information required to be disclosed by the Company in reports filed under the Exchange Act is recorded, processed, summarized and reported within the time periods specified in the rules and forms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#x201C;SEC&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and is accumulated and communicated to the Company&#x2019;s management, including its Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer, as appropriate to allow timely decisions regarding required disclosure.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. A controls system, no matter how well designed and operated, cannot provide absolute assurance that the objectives of the controls system are met, and no evaluation of controls can provide absolute assurance that all control issues and instances of fraud, if any, within a company have been detected.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 10.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Management&#x2019;s Report on Internal Control Over Financial Reporting and Attestation Report of the Registered Public Accounting Firm
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Management is responsible for establishing and maintaining adequate internal control over financial reporting, as defined in Rule 13a-15(f) of the Exchange Act. Management has assessed the effectiveness of our internal control over financial reporting as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	April
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;30, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;based on criteria established in Internal Control-Integrated Framework (2013) issued by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission. As a result of this assessment, management concluded that, as of April&nbsp;30, 2016, our internal control over financial reporting was effective in providing reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	annual report on Form 10-K does not include an attestation report of our independent registered public accounting firm due to a transition period established by the rules of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	SEC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for newly public companies.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 10.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 10.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Change
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	in Internal Control over Financial Reporting
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 10.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 10.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	There have been no changes in the Company's internal control over financial reporting during the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	three-month
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ending April 30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	identified in connection with the evaluation required by Rules 13a-15(d) and 15d-15(d) under the Exchange Act that have materially affected, or that are reasonably likely to materially affect, the Company's internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 10.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:1.2PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:1.2PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:1.2PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Item 9B. Other Information.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:1.2PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	Item 12. Security Ownership of Certain Beneficial Owners and Management and Related Stockholder Matters.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:1.2PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</FONT>

	The 2016 Proxy Statement will be filed with the SEC within 120 days after the end of the fiscal year to which this report relates.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Equity Compensation Plan Information
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On November 4, 2014, the Company&#x2019;s board of directors adopted the Peak Resorts, Inc. 2014 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#x201C;Incentive Plan&#x201D;), and on November 5, 2014, the Company&#x2019;s stockholders approved the Incentive Plan. The stockholders approved a maximum of 559,296 shares to be available for issuance under the Incentive Plan. The Incentive Plan authorizes the Company to grant stock options, stock appreciation rights, restricted stock, restricted stock units, stock bonuses, other stock-based awards, cash awards, or any combination thereof, as defined in and allowed by the Incentive Plan. As of April 30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	63,741 restricted stock units were issued to independent directors, of which 5,334 were forfeited, resulting in a remaining balance of 500,889 shares available for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	issuance,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as illustrated in the table below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage91"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 14PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	E
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Exhibit 10.64
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:14PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 14PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:14PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	THIRD AMENDMENT TO LEASE AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	THIS THIRD AMENDMENT TO LEASE AGREEMENT (this &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Amendment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#x201D;) is made as of the __8___ day of June, 2016 (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#x201D;), by and between EPT MAD RIVER, INC., a Missouri corporation (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Landlord
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#x201D;) and MAD RIVER MOUNTAIN, INC., a Missouri corporation (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Tenant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	RECITALS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	A.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Landlord and Tenant are parties to that certain Lease Agreement dated as of November 17, 2005 (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Original Lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#x201D;) wherein Landlord leased to Tenant and Tenant leased from Landlord certain premises located on real property in the Village of Valley Hi, Logan County, Ohio, as more particularly described in the Original Lease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	B.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The Original Lease was modified and amended pursuant to that certain First Amendment to Lease Agreement dated June 30, 2006 and that certain Second Amendment to Lease Agreement dated December 1, 2014 (as further amended by this Amendment, collectively referred to herein as the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	C.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	On or about September 16, 2015, portions of the Leased Premises, consisting of the base lodge, existing office building, ticketing building and adaptive learning building, were damaged by fire and rendered unuseable (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Casualty Event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#x201D;), however, notwithstanding the Casualty Event, Tenant continued to fully operate on the Leased Premises and perform its obligations under, and in accordance with, the Lease, including, without limitation, the payment of Rent.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	D.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Landlord and Tenant are in the process of obtaining insurance proceeds from Tenant's insurers from which Tenant will use to construct the Tenant Improvements (hereinafter defined) on the Leased Premises, the costs of which will exceed the anticipated amount of insurance proceeds to be made available from Tenant's insurers and Landlord is willing to provide funding to Tenant to undertake development and construction of the Tenant Improvements as provided in this Amendment.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	E.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Landlord and Tenant desire to enter into this Amendment to modify the terms of the Lease as set forth below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	NOW, THEREFORE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	in consideration of the above recitals, the terms, covenants and agreements contained herein, and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged by the parties hereto, the parties hereby agree as follows
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:54PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Defined Terms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Defined terms not otherwise defined herein shall have the meaning given to such term in the Lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:54PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Incorporation of Recitals

	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The foregoing recitals are hereby incorporated herein by reference.

<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:54PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tenant Improvements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tenant Improvements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	desires to construct certain improvements and the performance of certain work upon the Leased Premises, including the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i) demolition of the old base lodge, existing office building, ticketing building, and adaptive learning building, (ii) development and construction of a new base lodge, (iii) construction of a sidewalk to the rental facility from the new base lodge, and (iv) addition of traffic pattern lighting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	as described on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, attached hereto and incorporated herein by reference (collectively, the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tenant Improvements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;), which shall be performed by Tenant pursuant to the terms of the Lease and this Amendment.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Tenant Improvements shall at all times fully comply with all applicable federal, state and municipal laws, ordinances, regulations, codes and other governmental requirements now or hereafter in force and Tenant shall, at Tenant's sole cost and expense, take all actions now or hereafter necessary to ensure such compliance.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 90PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Construction of Tenant Improvements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Within ten (10) days after the date hereof, Tenant shall cause delivery to Landlord, for Landlord&#x2019;s review and approval two sets of blueline prints describing the Tenant Improvements (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Preliminary Plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;) along with a draft budget for all of the Tenant Improvements (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Budget
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;Within ten (10) business days after receipt of Tenant&#x2019;s Preliminary Plans and the Budget, the Landlord will review the Preliminary Plans and the Budget and reply, either &#x201C;approving&#x201D;, &#x201C;approving with notations&#x201D; or &#x201C;disapproving&#x201D; the same.&nbsp;&nbsp;Landlord&#x2019;s approval shall not be unreasonably withheld
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	conditioned or delayed.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Preliminary Plans or the Budget (or any portions of either) are rejected by the Landlord for any reason, the Preliminary Plans or Budget, as the case may be, must be corrected and re-submitted until fully approved by Landlord and Tenant.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Preliminary Plans, as submitted to, and approved by, Landlord are hereinafter referred to as the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Final Plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;.&nbsp;&nbsp;Landlord&#x2019;s review of the Preliminary Plans and the Final Plans as set forth herein shall be for its sole purpose and shall not imply Landlord&#x2019;s review of the same, or obligate Landlord to review the same, for quality design, code compliance or other like matters, and Landlord shall have no liability whatsoever in connection therewith and shall not be responsible for any omissions or errors contained in the Preliminary Plans or the Final Plans.&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	retain a general contractor approved by Landlord
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	(the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	General Contractor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	pursuant to a construction contract in form approved by Landlord (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Construction Contract
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;), whereby the General Contractor is required to construct the Tenant Improvements in accordance with the Final Plans and the Construction Contract.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;Tenant shall cause Landlord to be recognized as an expressly intended third party beneficiary of the Construction Contract and to require the General Contractor to execute with respect to the Construction Contract an Acknowledgement of Third Party Beneficiary which is substantially in the form attached hereto as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 90PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

	&nbsp;
