<A NAME="eolPage93"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Payment of Tenant Improvements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant shall cooperate with Landlord and cause all available insurance proceeds made available to Tenant or Landlord arising from the Casualty Event (collectively, the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Insurance Proceeds
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#x201D;) to be delivered to Landlord and disbursed as part of the Tenant Improvement Allowance (hereinafter defined).&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition to the Insurance Proceeds,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Landlord shall provide Tenant with an additional improvement allowance in excess of the Insurance Proceeds (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Landlord Contribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;) for Tenant's expenses incurred in the construction of the Tenant Improvements on the Leased Premises (the Landlord Contribution together with the Insurance Proceeds shall hereinafter be referred to as the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tenant Improvement Allowance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;The Landlord Contribution shall be an amount equal to the lesser of (i) the actual costs of the Tenant Improvements on the Leased Premises in excess of the Insurance Proceeds, or (ii) $2,700,000.00.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Tenant Improvement Allowance shall only be used for the Tenant Improvements as defined in this Amendment and shall not be used to fund any of Tenant's Property or any other furniture, fixtures and equipment without Landlord's consent in its sole judgement. Landlord shall disburse the Tenant Improvement Allowance in accordance with the following requirements:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:91PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:91PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 44.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;">
	i.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:9PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:9PT;WIDTH:9PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The parties shall instruct General Contractor, other equipment vendors and all third parties submitting bills or invoices relating to the Tenant Improvements to submit their bills or invoices to Tenant, who will prepare payment requests and submit the same in writing to Landlord for Landlord's approval.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:91PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:91PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 44.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:9PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:9PT;WIDTH:9PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Upon Landlord's approval of any payment request, Landlord shall pay directly to the payees identified in such payment request, funds equal to the requested funds (or such portion thereof approved by Landlord), until Landlord has disbursed the entirety of the Tenant Improvement Allowance; provided, however, in the event any portion of the Insurance Proceeds have not been received by Landlord and the then current balance of the Tenant Improvement Allowance is not sufficient to satisfy a payment request, Landlord may pay such payment request in excess of the Tenant Improvement Allowance, in Landlord's sole and absolute discretion, and then use any subsequent Insurance Proceeds to reimburse Landlord for such excess expenditures above and beyond the Landlord Contribution, or bill same directly to Tenant which Tenant shall pay to Landlord within fifteen (15) days after receipt of same from Landlord.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event of a payment to the account of Tenant, Tenant shall then make payments in accordance with the request, and shall send to Landlord proof of payment in form reasonably requested by Landlord.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

	Copies of invoices from various contractors and/or subcontractors to match total amount reflected on each AIA G702 and AIA G703 forms that are submitted.&nbsp;&nbsp;Invoices greater than $5,000 should also be accompanied by conditional (for amounts to be paid) and unconditional (for amounts already paid) lien waivers if progress billings are involved, with a final unconditional lien waiver when the job is completed;

<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 44.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:9PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:9PT;WIDTH:9PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Upon the final payment request, (a) certificate of occupancy, (b) certificate of Substantial Completion from Tenant's architect (on AIA form), (c) as-built plans detailing the building, site work, and site work utilities if materially different from the Final Plans, (d) copies of any and all warranties from Tenant's contractors and suppliers, and (e) copies of any and all operations and maintenance manuals related to the Leased Premises;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

	For each payment request for any portion of the Tenant Improvements not made, pursuant to (ii) above, on AIA G702 and AIA G703 forms:&nbsp;&nbsp;a certification from Tenant and each contractor, subcontractor, or other vendor or supplier with respect to which payment is requested, in a form reasonably acceptable to Landlord, confirming the identification of each subcontractor or sub-vendor or sub-supplier contributing labor, materials or supplies in connection with such portion of the Tenant Improvements, together with conditional (for amounts to be paid) and unconditional (for amounts already paid) lien waivers if progress billings are involved, and final unconditional lien waivers when the job is completed, for all invoices greater than $5,000.

<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	e.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Timing for Payment Requests
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;With respect to payment requests by Tenant or by the General Contractor, provided that an application for payment is received by Landlord on or before the last day of a given month, Landlord shall pay the amount due (recognizing that the &#x201C;amount due&#x201D; does not include retainage which may be withheld under the Construction Contract) directly to the General Contractor on or before the 15th day of the next month (unless otherwise provided in the Construction Contract).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 8PT 0PT 0PT;">
	f.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Title to Tenant Improvements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any and all Tenant Improvements which may be made in or upon the Leased Premises shall become the property of Landlord and remain upon and be surrendered with the Leased Premises at the expiration of the Term without compensation to Tenant.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;No portion of the Tenant Improvement Allowance shall be allowed as a setoff against Rent or other charges owing to Landlord by Tenant.&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 108PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 7PT 0PT 0PT;">
	h.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Liens
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Tenant shall keep the Leased Premises and any interest therein, free and clear of all mechanics' liens and all other liens. Tenant shall give Landlord immediate, written notice of any lien filed against the Leased Premises, or any interest therein related to or arising from work performed by or for Tenant. If Tenant shall in good faith contest the validity of any such lien, claim or demand in connection with the Tenant Improvements, then Tenant, at its sole expense, shall defend, indemnify, protect and hold the Leased Premises and Landlord harmless against the same and shall pay and satisfy any such adverse judgment that may be rendered thereon before the enforcement thereof against Tenant, Landlord, or the Leased Premises.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon Landlord's request, Tenant shall furnish to Landlord a corporate surety bond, satisfactory to Landlord, in an amount equal to one and one-half (1 1/2) times the amount of any such contested lien, claim or demand, indemnifying Landlord and Tenant from liability for any such lien, claim or demand and holding the Leased Premises free and harmless from and against the effect of any such lien, claim or demand and causing the release and reconveyance of said lien from the Leased Premises.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, Landlord shall have the right to require that Tenant pay Landlord's attorneys' fees and disbursements, court costs and other costs in defending any such action if Landlord is named as a party to any such action, the lien encumbers any portion of the Leased Premises or if Landlord elects to defend any such action or lien.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 108PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 8PT 0PT 0PT;">
	i.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Suspension of Tenant Improvement Allowance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In no event shall Landlord be obligated to disburse any portion of the Tenant Improvement Allowance if Tenant is in arrears with regard to any Rent or other charges which might be due or owing, or otherwise in default under the Lease.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:54PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Amendment of Section 2(A) of the Original Lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Effective as of December 1, 2016, the definition of Percentage Rate in Section 2(A) of the Original Lease is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Percentage Rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D; shall mean 33%.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:54PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Amendment of Section 1(B)(1) of the Rent and Expense Rider to the Original Lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Effective as of December 1, 2016, Section 1(B)(1) of the Rent and Expense Rider to the Original Lease is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 36PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	In addition to the Annual Fixed Rent, Tenant shall pay Landlord as percentage rent (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Annual Percentage Rent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;) an amount for each Lease Year equal to the Percentage Rate multiplied by the Gross Receipts for such Lease Year in excess of $7,400,000.00 (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Base Amount
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;); provided, however, Annual Percentage Rent shall not exceed in any Lease Year, an amount equal to twenty percent (20%) of the Landlord Contribution.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	For purposes of example only, assume that the Landlord Contribution is
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	F -
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage96"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 36PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	$2,500,000.00 and that the Gross Receipts for the applicable Lease Year is $9,000,000.00.&nbsp;&nbsp;Under this example, the Annual Percentage Rent would be equal to the Percentage Rate (33%) multiplied by $1,600,000.00 (which equals the amount by which the Gross Receipts for the applicable Lease Year exceed the Base Amount divided by the Percentage Rate), or $500,000.00 (33% of $1,600,000, but capped at $500,000.00).&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Within 60 days following the end of each Lease Year, Tenant shall furnish Landlord with a statement, verified by a corporate officer of Tenant, showing the amount of Gross Receipts for the preceding Lease Year, which statement shall be accompanied by Tenant's payment of Annual Percentage Rent, if any, is due.&nbsp;&nbsp;Beginning on December 1, 2021 and continuing on every fifth (5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-SIZE:6PT;VERTICAL-ALIGN:SUPER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	) anniversary thereafter, the Base Amount shall increase by five percent (5%) over the Base Amount in the immediately preceding Lease Year.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:54PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	6.
</FONT>
<A NAME="SKIS-20160430XEX10_64_HTM__TOC97648207">
</A>
<A NAME="SKIS-20160430XEX10_64_HTM__TOC97648158">
</A>
<A NAME="SKIS-20160430XEX10_64_HTM__TOC97470902">
</A>
<A NAME="SKIS-20160430XEX10_64_HTM__TOC96837594">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Amendment of Section 22(A) of the Original Lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Section 22(A) of the Original Lease is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 36PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In General
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;So long as Landlord shall not be in default under this Lease, Tenant will, except when prevented from so doing by Force Majeure or by other causes beyond its reasonable control and subject to the provisions of the Articles captioned &#x201C;Subletting and Assigning,&#x201D; &#x201C;Damage Clause,&#x201D; and &#x201C;Condemnation&#x201D; during the Term of this Lease, operate or cause to be operated a ski resort in the Ski Facility (such covenant being herein called &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tenant's Operating Covenant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;).&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:54PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;;;PADDING:0PT 6PT 0PT 0PT;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Counterparts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;This Amendment may be executed at different times and in any number of counterparts, each of which when so executed shall be deemed to be an original and all of which taken together shall constitute one and the same agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Delivery of an executed counterpart of a signature page to this Amendment by facsimile or electronic mail shall be as effective as delivery of a manually executed counterpart of this Amendment.&nbsp;&nbsp;In proving this Amendment, it shall not be necessary to produce or account for more than one such counterpart signed by the party against whom enforcement is sought.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The undersigned Guarantor of the Lease hereby (i) acknowledges and consents to the terms of the foregoing Amendment, (ii) reaffirms the full force and effect of its Guaranty dated November 17, 2005 (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Guaranty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#x201D;), as of the day and year first above written, (iii) agrees that the Guaranty guarantees payment and performance of all Obligations, as defined in the Guaranty, as modified pursuant to this Amendment, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	absolutely, unconditionally and irrevocably guarantees the prompt, full, and faithful performance of all of the terms, covenants and provisions of this Amendment by the Tenant to Landlord and Landlord's successors and assigns, including, but not limited to, the full, prompt and complete performance by the Tenant of all covenants, conditions and provisions in this Amendment required to be performed by the Tenant, including but not limited to the construction and completion of the Tenant Improvements thereunder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit A

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Acknowledgement of Third Party Beneficiary
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	This Acknowledgment of Third Party Beneficiary is executed this ____________ day of __________________, 20__, by ______________________
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	("
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	General Contractor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	"),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	a contractor retained by Mad River Mountain, Inc., a Missouri corporation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	("
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Tenant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	") to perform certain work and services for EPT Mad River, Inc., a Missouri corporation (together with its successors and assigns, collectively, "
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Landlord
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	") and Tenant relating to the construction of a new ski area base lodge and related improvements on that certain tract of real estate at Mad River Mountain Ski Resort in Bellefountaine, Ohio (the "
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Project
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	").&nbsp;&nbsp;In consideration of the contract(s) between Tenant and General Contractor (the "
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Construction Contract
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	"),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	relating to construction of such improvements and construction and performance of such site improvement work and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged, General Contractor agrees as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;PADDING:0PT 1PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	General Contractor acknowledges and agrees that General Contractor is responsible to complete the Work required by the Construction Contract in accordance with the terms thereof, in accordance with the plans and specifications for the Project, and in compliance with all applicable codes, ordinances and laws.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:72PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:12PT;DISPLAY: INLINE;PADDING:0PT 1PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	General Contractor acknowledges that the Project is being performed for the benefit of Landlord and Tenant.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, General Contractor hereby acknowledges and agrees that Landlord is an expressly intended third-party beneficiary of the Construction Contract.&nbsp;&nbsp;General Contractor agrees that Landlord's status as an intended third-party beneficiary does not constitute or create a contractual relationship between Landlord and General Contractor and does not allow General Contractor to enforce the Construction Contract directly against Landlord.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, General Contractor agrees that as an intended third-party beneficiary, Landlord shall have the right to enforce the terms of the Construction Contract directly against General Contractor, without accepting any assignment of the Construction Contract, and that in such event Landlord shall be entitled to full and direct performance from General Contractor of the Construction Contract and all warranties provided therein.&nbsp;&nbsp;Specifically, in this regard, General Contractor acknowledges and agrees that it shall be directly and fully responsible to Landlord for the work and services provided by General Contractor on the Project and for all non-conformities, defects or deficiencies in such work and services provided by General Contractor for the Project.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, General Contractor hereby agrees that all indemnities and insurance coverages procured by General Contractor under the Construction Contract shall include and run to the benefit of Landlord and its agents, employees, officers and servants.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 345.6PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXHIBIT 31.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 90.5PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 90.5PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION OF THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 90.5PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PURUANT TO SECTION 302 OF THE
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 90.5PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	I, Timothy D. Boyd, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:11.15PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	1. I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Peak Resorts, Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.65PT 57.6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2. Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:11.05PT 57.6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	3. Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:11.05PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4. The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e))
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Exchange Act
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:11PT 64.8PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	a) Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:11PT 64.8PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	b) Designed such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	internal control over financial reporting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or caused such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	internal control over financial reporting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.65PT 64.8PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	) Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:11PT 0PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	) Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.55PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5. The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.55PT 75.6PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	a) All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.55PT 0PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	b) Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 75.00%;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:33.36%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:12.60PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 396PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXHIBIT 31.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 90.5PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 90.5PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION OF THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 90.5PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PURUANT TO SECTION 302 OF THE
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 90.5PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 90.5PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	I, Stephen J. Mueller, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:11.15PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	1. I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Peak Resorts, Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.55PT 57.6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	2. Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.6PT 57.6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	3. Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.55PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	4. The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e))
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	internal control over financial reporting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(as defined in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	Exchange Act
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.75PT 64.8PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	a) Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:11PT 64.8PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	b) Designed such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	internal control over financial reporting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	, or caused such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	internal control over financial reporting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.75PT 64.8PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	) Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:11PT 64.8PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	) Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.55PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	5. The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.55PT 75.6PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	a)All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:10.55PT 0PT 0PT 90PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	b) Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 75.00%;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:33.36%;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	te
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:25.34%;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:41.30%;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
